attributes.review: So this... has to be the worst app I have EVER seen or experienced it was frozen, glitchy, and down right useless took a week to download and couldn’t even use it! horrible.
attributes.title: The worst EVER!

attributes.review: This app made my phone glitch so much. I even went to the iPhone repair store and the apple store and they said they couldn’t fix it. So I had to buy a new phone. 😡😡😡
attributes.title: Horrible app 😡😡😡

attributes.review: Never tells me anything about when there’s going to be a rally and so I can buy tickets and not go and the app is so horrible overall
attributes.title: Horrible

attributes.review: Absolutely disgusting, vile, cruel app. It told me and my wife to kill ourselves. I thought this app would include information about his perverted behavior and the 40+ victims he sexually assaulted but it didn’t. DISAPPOINTED!!!! NEEDS TAKEN DOWN!!!!!!!!!!
attributes.title: This app made me want to commit suicide

attributes.review: After waiting 7 hours for the app to download, my phone crashed and all of my data, including photos and important documents, was lost. Please protect yourself and DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!!
attributes.title: Beware of Viruses

attributes.review: Horrible. The app always glitches and when the app is open it makes my phone run really slow. Do NOT recommend this app
attributes.title: Don’t download this app.

attributes.review: This is the worst app it took way to long to download Nd it’s just the way things are set up is just Terrible also it glitches a lot and messes up ur phone

attributes.review: This app is a horribly made platform provided for a horribly made president... not sure why we expected it do be made any better than he’s ran his presidency.
attributes.title: Horrible app. Horrible experience.

attributes.review: This app gave me a headache. It made my phone glitch. Within three hours of using the app I started throwing up. My cat started screaming for some reason. My neighbor started a fire at his house. THIS APP IS CURSED.  if you want to live do NOT download.
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD

attributes.review: This is a bad app it always glitches and it won’t let me delete also my phone started to act up when I downloaded the so don’t download it
